ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ANDREA T. BOBKOWICZ of Westmount, Quebec, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Linda Cardinal.
